name: DOWN-FALL
description:
[ UNDER CONSTRUCTION ] 

Down-fall is a single player 2D platformer game, inspired by the themes " School shooting " and " War ", the game features a young lady from a prestigious high school along with her newly made friend trying to escape their school and their town, seeking for protection.

INTRACTION WITH THE SOFTWARE!

To move front and back use the arrow keys, in order to jump use the space bar and to attack left click in ur mouse or mouse pad. 

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE

this is just a prototype better quality backgrounds, enemies, and story functions will shortly arrive, I will appreciate it if you guys share this project as it will motivate me to upgrade it sooner.

CREDITS

Gacha Club
